title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Camping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping              Camping         NPS Photo  Camping is not available within the boundaries of Mount Rushmore National Memorial. Numerous opportunities for camping are available throughout the surrounding area. Information about camping in the Black Hills is available from these sources: South Dakota Tourism offers extensive campground listings throughout South Dakota. Black Hills and Badlands Tourism Association provides information on camping in the Black Hills area. The Black Hills National Forest has 30 campgrounds available. Reservations can be made by phone through ReserveUSA at 1-877-444-6777 or online.
